evidence.source_document: Order Re National Science Foundation's Suspension of Grants
evidence.text: While the injunction was on appeal, the district court modified the order to provide further explanation of the meaning of the phrases “at the surface” and “reasonably expeditious.”  The Ninth Circuit found that the modifications made by the district court “did not materially alter the status of the consolidated appeal,” and that such alterations were proper pursuant to Rule 62(d).  Pursuant to the Preliminary Injunction (Dkt. No. 55), the suspension of the grants at issue here is VACATED.
